main event: A witness reported observing a strange light that transformed into a disc-shaped object on March 26, 1967.
interesting points: The light was initially thought to be a star shining through the clouds., The object appeared reddish in color and changed shape during the sighting., A second smaller light appeared during the observation., The witness mentioned taking three photographs of the objects., The objects appeared to maneuver in the sky before disappearing.
witness description: the witness described the object as bright and reddish, and thought it might signify something significant.
